name: Cavelight Moss
description: The Cavelight Moss is a large plant creature that emits light in dark areas and has a unique ability to grapple foes with its tendrils.
memorable: Its capability to grapple and exhaust adventurers while providing illumination makes it both fascinating and dangerous in combat.
goals: To ensnare and sap the strength of creatures that come near.
relations: Related to other plant creatures, possibly found in caves alongside other subterranean life.
environment: Subterranean ecosystems, particularly in dark cave environments.
strengths: High hit points, natural armor, and ability to make opponents exhausted.
weaknesses: Low mobility and very low intelligence make it vulnerable to more cunning foes.
attacks: Can make two Tendrils attacks that can grapple and restrain opponents, causing exhaustion.
most_powerful_ability: Variable Illumination allows it to adjust the radius of bright light it emits.
senses: Possesses tremorsense out to 60 feet, allowing it to detect vibrations in its surroundings.
skills: Possesses damage resistances to acid, cold, fire, and slashing from nonmagical attacks, and has immunity to many crowd control effects.
additional_information: Can only grapple one creature at a time.
Grappling imposes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw on foes.
test_queries: large moss that exhausts its opponents
subterranean plant that emits bright light
